title: LP Loss
body: Just fininshed my promos, losing the series, and was dropped down to 58 LP. is this even fair like seriously a person i was playing with in the exact same situation only dropped to 86 LP. Please explain?

replies.body: You still take Lp loss during promos, if you were lost 2 in a row before ending the series you would have lost 21 Lo for each one
If you lost all 3 then that would be the combines loss or if you won 1 then lost 3 it could take you down to that.
